scripts.prepush: node tools/preflight.mjs && npx tsc --noEmit && npx eslint . --max-warnings=0 && next build
scripts.prepare: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const isCI=process.env.CI||process.env.VERCEL; if(isCI) process.exit(0); try{fs.statSync('.git');}catch(e){process.exit(0);}" && npx simple-git-hooks
